channel.title: Making a piece of code repeat itself?

item.title: Making a piece of code repeat itself?
item.dc:creator: @jailed jailed
item.description:
@jailed wrote:

I’m simply trying too make this little piece of code repeat itself for a timer…

if(fakeVirus >= 0) { fakeVirus += 1; }

The whole code for the class is:

[code=java]public class FakeVirusInitializer {

public static void sM(String aMessage){
    System.out.println(aMessage);
}

public static void main(String[] args)
{
	
	int fakeVirus = 0;
	
	if(fakeVirus >= 0) {
		fakeVirus += 1;
	}
	
	sM("Initializing virus, "+fakeVirus+"%");
	
    }
}[/code]

Read full topic
item.source: Making a piece of code repeat itself?
